pr_title: [transport.modbus] Added support for RTU encoding over TCP

timeline.message:

[modbus] test RTU encoding over TCP on specific live device

timeline.bodyText: I suggest removing this class as it has been effectively disabled and cannot be easily run without real device.
timeline.author: ssalonen
